title: Bug 49536 - No content returned when accessing URL with no webapps deployed
OB: When accessing a URL after starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, HTTP code 200 OK is returned with no content.
EB: When accessing a URL after starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, an HTTP error 404 should be returned.
SR:
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps
3. Access a URL
